items.text:
You and Elder Orlin’s group steadily make your way across the bridge,
fighting off reclaimers with every step. Elder Orlin stands shoulder to
shoulder with you, swinging her hammer at any reclaimer that dares
cross her path.

Once you reach the bank of the Silverfin, Elder Orlin catches her
breath. “I haven't gotten that much exercise in eighty years!” she
says as she wipes the sweat from her brow. “You've done well. I can
keep an eye on them from here.”
on the campaign tracker, and return Elder Mora Orlin to the collection.
